tswitem.name: Advanced Kickback - Defence
tswitem.tooltip:
Advanced Kickback - Defence
Gadget (QL 10 Epic)
Character Bound
Kickback: For 20 seconds, whenever you are glanced you gain
1: 714 Hit Rating
2: 714 Block Rating
3: 834 Critical Rating
4: 720 Critical Power Rating
5: 714 Defence Rating
6: 813 Evade Rating
7: 475 Physical and Magical Protection
8: 714 Penetration Rating
for 4 seconds. Applies a 2 minute cooldown to all Kickbacks.
